column1: Smoque BBQ////Me and two of my friends arrived with some beers around 7:00pm on a Tuesday.  It was lively
column3: and smelled incredible.  Everything is ordered off a large chalkboard and seats are assigned only after you plae your order at the counter.  It's loud and cramped but I didn't mind one bit.  If you do mind
column4: then you don't belong there as you have missed the point of what Smoque is about.  We're not there for the ambiance
